clinical_study.brief_title: To Assess the Predictive Value of D-dimer Level on the Occurrence of Cardiovascular Events
clinical_study.official_title: Place Des D-dimères Dans la Prise en Charge Des Patients en Fibrillation Auriculaire : Evaluation de la Valeur prédictive Des D-dimères Sur la Survenue d'événements Thromboemboliques

brief_summary.textblock: The primary aim of the study was to assess whether D-Dimer level at entry or an increase of D-Dimer level during the follow-up could predict the occurrence of subsequent cardiovascular events in patients with atrial fibrillation.

detailed_description.textblock: Patients will be followed-up every 4 months with clinical assessment and D-dimer blinded measurement.

biospec_descr.textblock: No biospecimens are to be retained

study_pop.textblock: Patients with atrial fibrillation encountered in usual care

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- atrial fibrillation
Exclusion Criteria:
- follow-up not possible, poor prognosis within 3 months
